title.rendered: A photo at the NPG… sort of

content.rendered:
It was pretty thrilling to see the last issue of fLIP magazine, with my photo on the cover, for sale at the National Portrait Gallery right next to the British Journal of Photography.

I probably looked a like a bit of a nutcase, excitedly taking photos of the magazine display… oh well :D
